title: lens_prune
description: Remove non-essentials from an existing plan by focusing on steps that move the chosen metric.

metric.description: Primary metric or outcome to optimize (e.g., activation rate, delivery date).

non_negotiables.description: Steps or constraints that must be preserved.

timebox_hint.description: Optional target timebox (free text, e.g., '1w', 'end of sprint').

context.description: Short context to ground pruning decisions.

keep_ratio.description: Optional target fraction of steps to keep (0..1).
